transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Ji, hi Raghuvir ji baat kar rahe hai NGM Maharashtra se.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Ji, hi good evening Raghuvir ji kaise ho aap?
Customer: Mam, mai acha hu.
Executive: That's nice to hear this. Raghuvir ji Anita baat kar rahi thi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Anita madam office se aapki baat hui thi ek tarike se regarding your services right?
Customer: Mam, group banaya hua hai na?
Executive: Hanji, hanji, hanji. To aap group me hai?
Customer: Let me check. Aap bilkul mai group me hu.
Customer: Aapne dekh, aapne dekha maine kya message diya hai?
Customer: Aaj ki agar hum aaj ki update ki baat kare, aaj ki date me aapne ek lead wo kiya hai, wo kaam ki nahi hai, thik hai na?
Executive: Okay, thik hai.
Customer: Second thing, second thing koi voice call nahi aayi hai, koi lead mail pe nahi aayi hai.
Executive: Sir, mai aapko batati hu dekhiye voice call ka na, it will take a little time kyuki services jaise jaise aap use karte jayenge na, to system update hota jayega.
Customer: Mam aisa hai aap chahe kuch bhi keh lijiye, thik hai na? Mai buylead mai nahi consume karunga.
Executive: Ek minute meri baat suniye sir, its a request please suniyega meri baat ko.
Customer: Mam aisa hai meri baat ko samajhiyega mai kahi pe click-cluck karta hu, mere ko hi call aane lag jati hai, thik hai na?
Customer: Mai jin pe click karta hu unko dusre logo ki call chali jati hai.
Customer: For example mai, mere paas me jitni leads aayi hui thi, thik hai na? Unko maine apne catalog ka link maine chats ke through bheja.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai na?
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai? Jab maine apna catalog unke paas bheja to wo call competitor ke paas me ja rahi hai because they have clicked on my catalog.
Customer: Aap problem ko nahi samajh pa rahe hai ki mai, mai mana kyu kar raha hu ki mai aapki site pe mai kaam nahi karunga?
Customer: Kyuki mai jab usse kaam karta hu, aap hi ka jo ka banaya hua jo mera catalog hai mai kisi ke sath share karta hu, if somebody clicks on it, thik hai na? That lead is diverted to some other person, hai na? Who is basically nobody other than my competitor.
Executive: Okay, means aap kisi ko bhi agar bhej rahe hai catalog wo us pe click kar raha hai to wo kisi aur ke paas ja raha hai?
Customer: Bilkul ja raha hai mam.
Customer: Bilkul ja raha hai aur jo dusre ke catalog pe click hue hote hai wo mere paas me aati hai leads aapki.
Executive: Sir wo inquiries hoti hai, wo agar dekhiye mai aapko batati hu dekhiye.
Customer: Mam aisa hai if somebody is clicking on my catalog, it is basically simply a inquiry.
Executive: That's what exactly I am saying na sir dekho wo aapke alawa.
Customer: Ha exactly mai bhi wahi bol raha hu then why mam ek baat batao mere ko mai aapke catalog pe kyu kaam karunga?
Customer: Wo mera catalog thodi hua usme naam mera likha hua hai.
Customer: Thik hai na? But wo kaam aapke aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye services hai dekhiye aaj maine agar koi product check kiya maine NGM NCBIM alert India pe click kiya, ab 515 agar mujhe koi related company waha dikh jati hai being a buyer ho sakta hai maine us pe click kiya ho sir to inquiry.
Customer: Mam aisa ho sakta hai wali baat nahi hai mam ho sakta hai wali baat nahi hai, it is confirmed.
Customer: Maine apne bande ko bola, sun lijiye, sun lijiye, sun lijiye. Maine apne bande ko maine bola ki shudh CRM pe inquiry dalo. Unhone shudh CRM pe inquiry dali, thik hai? Mujhe Noida se call aayi ki sir aapko shudh CRM chahiye?
Customer: Noida me kaun mera competitor baat kar raha hai. Shudh CRM to mera brand hai.
Customer: He is selling my brand. Badi ajeeb si baat hai na?
Executive: Sir one second.
Customer: Aur aap dekhenge maine apne har product ke ke aage maine apna naam likha hua hai, chahe wo shudh SMS hai, chahe shudh CRM hai, shudh WhatsApp hai ya kuch bhi hai.
Executive: Sir one second call aapke hold pe.
Customer: Aap, aap mere ko mana kar sakte ho ki catalog ki image ke upar mai apna mobile number na likhu, lekin mai apna brand name to likh sakta hu. When I am putting my brand name I am getting the inquiry.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: That they are selling my brand name, hai na? Maine apne bando se inquiry dalwai shudh CRM ki. Mam aisa actually I am fed up, hai na? You are sixth and sixth or seventh person from the same IndiaMART. I am repeating the same story, thik hai na? Maine yesterday I have concluded that I will not working on on on your website if you can provide me the leads, hai na? On call on or on mail, thik hai na? I will work with you, otherwise 80000, 80000 approximately 80000 I have been transferred to you, thik hai na? I have transferred that amount at very crucial time when I was I I I want desperately I want the leads from you. Hai na? Mai soch raha tha ki bhai mere ko milega dhandha sudhrega, kuch nahi sudhra waise ka waise hi raha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai na? Tell me one thing, tell me one thing sir. You have posted the inquiry on the portal, okay? And jo aapka product hai shudh ultimate CRM ka wo alag alag catalogs pe tha is that?
Customer: Mam aisa hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Dekhiye mam actually I am an heart patient. Recently mere ko na cardiac arrest wagera bhi hua tha to mai abhi jyada nahi bolna chahta, hai na? Humble request meri baat ko dhyan se suniyega, thik hai na? Jab maine aap logo ko subscribe kar diya, aapne meri services ko activate kar diya. Maine bola sir check karte hai ki lead kaise aati hai, thik hai na? Maine hi apne team member ko bola shudh CRM pe search karo. Usne search karke apni inquiry dali, thik hai na? Kyuki wo to jo mera team member hai, thik hai na? Thik hai na? Let it be a one one of my client jisko maine bataya ki mera shudh CRM hai. Usne shudh CRM ko search karke us pe click kar diya. Click karne ke baad me wo inquiry Noida me chali gayi, thik hai na? Ki so and so so and so so and so has inquired about the shudh CRM. Aapki is tarike se wording is wording me aapki wo gayi hai, thik hai na? Shudh CRM ko mere package ki jagah pe aapne as a product as a whole le liya aur then I started getting calls, thik hai na? You want CRM, you want CRM, you want CRM, you want CRM, hai na? Aur in fact it was you want shudh CRM, you want shudh CRM. Then I told him that it is my brand and you are selling it back to me.
Executive: Okay, thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai na? Is karan se aap to aap ye samajh gaye honge na ki madam mai kyu nahi kaam karna chahta uske upar? Mai samajh rahi hu.
Customer: Kyuki mai apne mai aapke usse karna hoga to mai kya kaam karunga? Mai apna catalog hi to share karunga dusre logo ke sath me.
Executive: Right, right, right, right.
Customer: Thik hai na? When I am sharing my catalog to other people, hai na? I am diverting redirecting to other people.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Mam aapki company bahut badi hai, thik hai na? Isme koi do rai nahi hai, thik hai na? Lekin mera bhi dhandha thik thak chal thik thak hai lekin is tarike se to band karne wali baat ho jayegi madam.
Executive: Mai samajh rahi hu aapki.
Customer: Thik hai na? Maine, haa. Dekhiye ruko. Aur iske liye maine ek detail mail bhi dali thi aapke is process ko samajhne ke liye. To unhone mere ko bade hi shant tarike se bata diya tha ki this is your style of working ki unke paas me koi bhi lead aayegi wo dusre logo ko share karenge. No ye this is aapka basic funda hai jiske upar aap kaam karte hai, thik hai na? To usi samay fir maine decide kar liya ki bhai nahi karunga mai. Samajh rahi hu.
Customer: Thik hai na? And and again and again daily another person is calling and I am explaining the same thing. Pehle ek bande ne hafte pehle mere se baat ki takriban 40-45 minute tak baat ki. Maine bola apne senior se baat karana. Senior se baat nahi kar fir Arman ne call kiya mere ko. Fir kal somebody else has called me. Thik hai na? He told me that Arman is on leave.
Executive: Yes mam sabki baat.
Customer: Haa to aap dekh lijiye mam aisa hai abhi aap mere se bataye ki mere se aap kya expect karte hai wo bataye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye I think jis tarike se aapne leads ka aap mujhe bata rahe ho aapne se karwaya tha I can understand that thing. But mai yaha pe kya keh rahi hu sir dekhiye.
Customer: Mam aisa mere ko short and simple tarike se bata dijiye aap mere se kya chahte hai mai shayad karu mai lekin pakka nahi kehta mai.
Executive: I will tell you one thing mai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with lead quality and diversion to competitors.

- Expresses frustration with repeated explanations to different executives.

- Refuses to consume buyleads due to issues.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive tried to explain the lead generation process.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, competitors, leads, inquiry
